elements_HTML.German_CODE:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
 <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
 <title>Suche vereinfacht</title>
 <style type="text/css">

 #Corp_0
 {

 background-color: #[COULEUR_FOND];
 
 }

 #Titre_de_la_page
 {
color:black;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 background-color: rgb(224, 224, 224);
 border-radius: 24px;
 border-width: 0px;
 box-shadow: 3px 3px 26px 7px hsl(225,56%,42%);
 height: 70px;
 width: auto;
 }

 #Image_0
 {
 padding: 8pt;
 }

 #Nombre_resultat
 {
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-size: 14pt;
 color: lightblue;
 height: 23px;
 font-weight: bold;
 }

 #Page_0
 { 
 /* position: absolute;*/
 /*left: 12%;*/

 }

 #Table_0
 {

 background-color: rgb(255, 255, 208);
 border-radius: 24px;
 width: 75%;
 border: 2px solid Black;
 margin: auto;

 }

 #Table_1
 {
 width: 100%;
 }

 #colonne_1
 {
 width: 3%;
 }

 #colonne_2_a
 {
 border: thin solid #6495ed;
 }


 #colonne_2_b
 {
 background-color: rgb(240, 240, 204);
 }

 #colonne_3
 {
 width: 3%;
 }

 h3.padding_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }

 h4.padding_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }

 #Paragraphe_1
 {
 font-size: 10pt;
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }


 a.Transition_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 font-size: 12pt;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: bold;
 transition: background 0.3s ease 0.5s;
 }

 a.Transition_1:hover
 {
 color:white;
 background: #9C3;

 }

 </style>

<script type="text/javascript">

var Details_connexion ='[INFORMATIONS_RECHERCHE]';



</script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="shutter-reloaded\shutter-reloaded.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
<link href="lightbox/css/lightbox.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<style type='text/css'>
div#shNavBar a {color: #aaaacc;}
div#shNavBar {background-color:#013333;}
</style></head>

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
 <title>Menu Principale</title>
 <style type="text/css">

 #Corp_0
 {

 background-color: #0080C0;
 
 }

 #Titre_de_la_page
 {
 color:black;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 background-color: rgb(224, 224, 224);
 border-radius: 24px;
 border-width: 0px;
 box-shadow: 3px 3px 26px 7px hsl(225,56%,42%);
 7height: 70px;
 7width: auto;
 }

 #Image_0
 {
 padding: 8pt;
 }

 #Nombre_resultat
 {
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-size: 14pt;
 color: lightblue;
 height: 23px;
 font-weight: bold;
 }

 #Form_0
 { 

 position : relative; 
 left: 7%;
 }

 #IndexPage_0
 { 
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-size: 14pt;
 height: 23px;
 font-weight: bold;
 position : relative; 
 left: 7%;
 }


 #IndexPage_1
 { 
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-size: 14pt;
 height: 23px;
 font-weight: bold;
 position : relative;
 left: 7%;
 }


 #Page_0
 { 
 /*position: absolute;*/
 /*left: 12%;*/

 }

 #Table_0
 {

 background-color: rgb(255, 255, 208);
 border-radius: 24px;
 width: 95%;
 border: 2px solid Black;
 margin : 20px;
 position : relative; 
 left: 2%;

 }

 #Table_1
 {
 width: 100%;
 }

 #colonne_1
 {
 width: 3%;
 }

 #colonne_2_a
 {
 border: thin solid #6495ed;
 }


 #colonne_2_b
 {
 background-color: rgb(240, 240, 204);
 }

 #colonne_3
 {
 width: 3%;
 }

 h3.padding_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }

 h4.padding_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }

 #Paragraphe_1
 {
 font-size: 10pt;
 padding: 5pt;
 text-align: left;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: normal;
 color:black;
 }


 a.Transition_1
 {
 padding: 5pt;
 font-size: 12pt;
 font-family: Comic sans MS, Arial, Helvetica;
 font-weight: bold;
 transition: background 0.3s ease 0.5s;
 }

 a.Transition_1:hover
 {
 color:white;
 background: #9C3;

 }

 .style1
 {
 width: 260px;
 border: 1px solid #00FF00;
 /*background-color : #FF8000;*/
 background-color: rgb(230, 177, 154);
 }
 .style2
 {
 width: 36px;
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-weight: bold;
 background-color: #FFC080;
 }
 .style3
 {
 width: 280px;
 }
 .style4
 {
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-weight: bold;
 font-size: 12pt;
 color: #000000;
 }
 #Text1
 {
 width: 169px;
 }
 #Text2
 {
 width: 27px;
 }
 #Text3
 {
 width: 24px;
 }
 #Titre_Recherche_enregistrement
 {
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-weight: bold;
 font-size: 10pt;
 color: #000000;
 }
 #Titre_Gestion_des_données
 {
 margin-top: 0.4cm;
 page-break-after: avoid;
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-size: 12pt;
 text-decoration: underline;
 color: #000000;
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 #Numero_enregistrement_Text
 {
 width: 165px;
 }
 #Auteur_enregistrement_Text
 {
 width: 165px;
 }
 #Jour_Enregistrement
 {
 width: 32px;
 }
 #Mois_Enregistrement
 {
 width: 32px;
 }
 #Année_Enregistrement
 {
 width: 60px;
 }
 #Nbre_de_resultat_par_page
 {
 height: 20px;
 }
 #Lancez_la_recherche
 {
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-size: 12pt;
 color: #000000;
 font-weight: bold;
 height: 27px;
 }
 #Réinitialiser_le_formulaire
 {
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-size: 12pt;
 color: #000000;
 font-weight: bold;
 height: 27px;
 }

 #Etat_Recherche
 {
 font-family: 'Comic sans MS' , 'Arial' , 'Helvetica';
 font-size: 12pt;
 color: #000000;
 position : relative; 
 left: 7%;
 }

 #Corp_page
 {
 background-color : #00cccc;
 }
 </style>
<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
// <!CDATA[

function Lancez_la_recherche_onclick(Param1) {
window.external.RechercheEnregistrementGestionBase(Param1)
}

function Reload_page_onclick() {
window.location.reload();
}

// ]]>
</script>
</head>
